contextId.information: Here "itself" means neither Peter nor the angel opened it. AT: "the gate swung open for them" or "the gate opened itself for them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
contextId.quote: it opened for them by itself

contextId.information: "because he himself." The word "himself" is added for emphasis. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
The word "themselves" is used for emphasis. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
